de: Participants will debug faulty Python code across different difficulty levels.Their goal is to identify and correct errors while ensuring the code runs correctly and efficiently.
catchy_de: Put your debugging skills to the test! Code Detox challenges you to find and fix errors in buggy Python code within a limited time. Do you have what it takes to debug like a pro?
ru:
• ‚óè Individual event.
  • ‚óè Participants can only fix bugs and cannot rewrite logic unless specified.
  • ‚óè Using online resources, AI tools, or external help is prohibited.
  • ‚óè Hardcoded solutions will be penalized.
  • ‚óè Incorrect fixes result in negative marking.
  • ‚óè Submitting incorrect fixes will result in negative marking.
  • ‚óè The event uses only Python.
  • ‚óè The participant with the maximum score within the given time duration will be declared the winner.
  • ‚óè If two or more participants have the same score, the tie-breaker rules will apply.
  • ‚óè The participant with the highest score wins.

de: Welcome to the ultimate stock trading challenge, where participants will compete in a high-intensity virtual trading simulation. Each trader starts with ‚Çπ2,00,000 in virtual capital and must strategically trade within a selected set of NIFTY 50 stocks. With only 10 trades allowed, every decision matters! Track your profits and losses in real-time as we announce updates every 30 minutes. The participant with the highest realized profit at the end of 90 minutes wins. If all participants make a loss, the one with the smallest loss wins. In case of a tie, the participant who used fewer trades is the winner. Think you have what it takes to dominate the stock market?
catchy_de: Test your trading instincts in this fast-paced stock market simulation! With limited trades and a fixed capital, only the smartest traders will emerge victorious. Can you maximize your portfolio in 90 minutes?
ca: Stock Market | Trading Challenge | Virtual Portfolio
ru:
• RULES & REGULATIONS:
  •    ‚óè Strongly recommending to bring your own laptop(just to let you know we have lab computer too).
  •     ‚óè Platform: Neostox (Participants must create accounts in advance of the event).
  •     ‚óè Team Size: Solo (1 participant per team).
  •     ‚óè Starting Capital: ‚Çπ2,00,000 virtual money.
  •     ‚óè Trading Scope: Only NIFTY 50 stocks, limited to:
  •         ‚óè Reliance Industries
  •         ‚óè HDFC Bank
  •         ‚óè Adani Enterprises
  •         ‚óè Tata Motors
  •         ‚óè State Bank of India
  •         ‚óè Tech Mahindra
  •     ‚óè Trade Limit: Maximum of 10 trades allowed per participant.
  •     ‚óè Trading Type: Only intraday trading at market price and fixed quantity.
  •     ‚óè Profit/Loss Updates: Interim results announced every 30 minutes.
  •     ‚óè Disqualification Criteria:
  •         ‚óè Trading any stock outside the mentioned six.
  •         ‚óè Exceeding the 10-trade limit.
  •         ‚óè Spending more than ‚Çπ2,00,000.
  • CLOSING & RESULTS:
  •     ‚óè Trading Freeze: After 1 hour 30 minutes.
  •     ‚óè Winner Selection:
  •         ‚óè Primary Criteria: Participant with the highest realized profit (Total Sell Price - Total Buy Price).
  •         ‚óè If All Make a Loss: The participant with the smallest loss wins.
  •         ‚óè If There‚Äôs a Tie: The participant who used fewer trades is the winner.
  •     ‚óè Judging Decision: The committee's decision is final.

de: In this thrilling event, participants will tackle coding challenges where each solution reveals a hidden clue. By piecing together these clues, they will uncover the final answer. The event consists of two exciting rounds‚Äîone focused on Python coding and another on cryptography. Speed, accuracy, and logical thinking are the keys to victory!
catchy_de: Crack the Code, Decipher the Clue, Chase the Answer!
ca: Unleash your coding and cryptography skills to solve the ultimate challenge!
ru:
• Round 1
  •     ‚óè Please bring your laptop if possible.
  •     ‚óè Participants must solve simple python coding challenges within the given time.
  •     ‚óè The output of each challenge contains a hidden clue leading to the next step.
  •     ‚óè Incorrect submissions will result in negative marking.
  •     ‚óè Using online resources, AI tools, or external assistance is strictly prohibited.
  •     ‚óè Timely hints will be provided and you're allowed 3 hints, upon solving a quiz .
  • Round 2
  •     ‚óè Round 2 is pen and paper
  •     ‚óè Participants MUST apply basic decryption techniques like Playfair cipher, Caesar Cipher, and Transposition techniques like rail fence and substitution techniques to decipher the final answer.
  • Resources:https://youtu.be/UURjVI5cw4g?si=-j4OBRzwMELicMlr
  •     https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=whEJfas9MAI&ab_channel=NesoAcademy
  •     https://youtu.be/JtbKh_12ctg?si=WbvOA6-nbqrQmN5N
  •     https://youtu.be/MFwgaWRyfZE?si=zyim2LBt9gk6xAZ-
  •     ‚óè The first participant to crack the code and arrive at the correct answer wins.
  •     ‚óè In case of a tie, tie-breaker rules will be applied.

act_ev: Developing Event - you can use AI tools
de:
This Challenge is not just another hackathon - it's a playground for coders to build, improve, test their developing skills‚ÄîYes you can also build your dev skills here by leveraging AI tools and getting help from the internet.


  • üîç How It Works:
  •     ‚óè Choose Your Domain (Front-end, Back-end, or ‚ÄúJust Working‚Äù Scripts like a python code with some innovation ).
  •     ‚óè Unlock the Theme on event day (surprise twist!).
  •     ‚óè Build Something Epic in 45 mins (+10 mins to explain).
  •     ‚óè Show Off to judges‚Äîexplanation matters most (40% of your score!).

  • What Makes This Event Unique?
  •     ‚óè üé≤ Surprise Theme: Choose your domain, but the theme? That's revealed on event day!
  •     ‚óè üíª Flexible Domains: Front-end, Back-end, or Scripting - pick your playground
  •     ‚óè ü§ù Team Dynamics: Collaborate in pairs or be your own boss
  •     ‚óè üåê No Restrictions: AI, Google, online resources - all fair game. Just prove you truly understand your code
catchy_de: Imagine a coding adventure where creativity is your only limit, and your technical skills are your superpower. Join our Dev Dash Challenge Whether you‚Äôre copy-pasting your first HTML tag or debugging Kubernetes in your sleep, this is where code meets chaos‚Äîand genius is born. Before you hover-out you can use AI tools click üëá to know 'more'
ru:
Domains & Themes:


  • Front-End Development
  •     ‚óè Themes: Business landing pages, chat interfaces, product display.
  •     ‚óè Perfect for: Design enthusiasts and those who know HTML CSS(may be js).
  • Back-End Development
  •     ‚óè Themes: RESTful APIs(for CRUD operations), real-time chat application backend, dynamic content serving.
  •     ‚óè Perfect for: Those who know flask,springboot like frameworks(beginner level is enough)
  • Just-Working Scripts
  •     ‚óè Themes: Web scrapers, file automation(like send a file over email, file organizing), auto file conversion handling(ppt to pdf..), API wrappers(using external apis or creating one‚Äîjust a function).
  •     ‚óè Perfect for: Those who know any basic programming language and want to implement them.

Instructions:

  • Teams:
  •     ‚óè Up to 2 members per team.
  • Domain & Theme:
  •     ‚óè Choose your domain in advance; theme will be assigned on event day.
  • Time:
  •     ‚óè 45 minutes of coding plus 10 minutes for wrap-up.
  • Resources:
  •     ‚óè Use any online resources (search engines, tutorials, AI) but understand your code. Your understanding and execution will be evaluated.
  • Equipment:
  •     ‚óè It is advised bring your own laptop(if not we will arrange atleast one lab computer).
  • Judging:
  •     ‚óè Projects are judged on creativity (20%), efficiency (10%), explanation (40%), usability (20%), and domain-specific implementation (20%) => 100%.
  • Integrity:
  •     ‚óè All work must be done during the event.
  • Conduct:
  •     ‚óè Follow organizer instructions and maintain a respectful environment.
